p: IL-1β, and IFN-γ, are reported to stimulate the expression of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS), which causes NO formation leading to beta cell death. Using Griess reagent, we assessed cellular nitrite production, a surrogate marker for NO. Bergenin has been reported to downregulate the expression of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS), thereby reducing NO production [ 44, 45]. Similarly, in our current study, the cytokine cocktail we used highly elevated NO production in INS-1E cells; however, addition of beregnin significantly reduced NO levels in beta cells with an IC 50 value of 6.82 μM ( Table 1).
